artview.components.TiltButtonWindow¶

class artview.components.TiltButtonWindow(Vtilt, Vradar=None, Vgrid=None, name='TiltButtons', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Class to display the Window with Tilt Buttons.

__init__(Vtilt, Vradar=None, Vgrid=None, name='TiltButtons', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the Tilt Selection interface.

Parameters :

Vtilt : Variable instance

Tilt signal variable.

Vradar, Vgrid : Variable instance

Radar/Grid signal variable. None will create empty variable. For correct behavior one and just one of those should be provided

[Optional] :

name : string

Tilt Radiobutton window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to TiltButtonWindow window. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Notes

This class records the selected button and passes the change value back to variable.

Methods

TiltButtonWindow.CreateTiltWidget() Create a widget to store radio buttons to control tilt adjust.
TiltButtonWindow.NewGrid(variable, value, strong) Slot for ‘ValueChanged’ signal of Vgrid.
TiltButtonWindow.NewRadar(variable, value, ...) Slot for ‘ValueChanged’ signal of Vradar.
TiltButtonWindow.NewTilt(variable, value, strong) Slot for ‘ValueChanged’ signal of Vtilt.
TiltButtonWindow.SetTiltRadioButtonsGrid() Set a tilt selection using radio buttons.
TiltButtonWindow.SetTiltRadioButtonsRadar() Set a tilt selection using radio buttons.
TiltButtonWindow.TiltSelectCmd(ntilt) Captures a selection and update tilt variable.

Attributes

see Shared Variables Table

Vradar = None¶

see Shared Variables Table

Vtilt = None¶

see Shared Variables Table
